question: University of Pune was renamed after which social reformer?
explanation: Savitribai Phule is one of the pioneer in educational development in India. She and her husband Jyothirao Phule started schools for underprivileged girls in Pune, Maharashtra. She is fondly remembered as the first female teacher of India.Â  In order to honor her contribution to Indian education system, Pune University was renamed as Savitribai Phule Pune University in 2015.
